bibl.title: Origen. Scholarship in the Service of the Church
bibl.note: Voir en part. pp. 1-25: 1. Alexandria near Egypt (Location, topography, and population of Alexandria; - Politics and economics; - Culture; - Origen in Alexandria).
bibl.seg: Ronald E. Heine, Origen. Scholarship in the Service of the Church = Christian Theology in Context.
Oxford, Oxford University Press, 2010, 8°, xii-275 pp. ISBN 978-0-19-920907-1 (hbk) / 978-0-19-920908-8 (pbk). £56 (hbk) / 9 (pbk).
Voir en part. pp. 1-25: 1. Alexandria near Egypt (Location, topography, and population of Alexandria; - Politics and economics; - Culture; - Origen in Alexandria).
C.R. par Angela Forte, VetChr 47 (2010) pp. 349-350. - Paul R. Kolbet, JECS 19 (2011) pp. 610-612. - Peter W. Martens, ZAC 16 (2012-2013) pp. 374-376.
